name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Iris ORTALAZA, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Iris ORTALAZA, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
LARSEN and ZAPPALA, JJ., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Paul J. Downey, Philadelphia, for appellant.
John W. Packel, Chief, Appeal Div., Bradley S. Bridge, Philadelphia, for amicus — Public Defender Ass’n of Pennsylvania.
Ronald Eisenberg, Deputy Dist. Atty., Catherine Marshall, Chief, Appeals Div., Joan Weiner, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
618 A.2d 391
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Iris ORTALAZA, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 7, 1992.
Decided Jan. 7, 1993.
Paul J. Downey, Philadelphia, for appellant.
John W. Packel, Chief, Appeal Div., Bradley S. Bridge, Philadelphia, for amicus — Public Defender Ass’n of Pennsylvania.
Ronald Eisenberg, Deputy Dist. Atty., Catherine Marshall, Chief, Appeals Div., Joan Weiner, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, JJ.
